name: Shooter Strike FPS
description:
Raise your weapons in a war zone because it’s the matter of your nation survival in this military operation. Your country is under attack of terrorist and suicide bombers, kill them all and rescue the hostages but be careful about snipers in combat attack. Defuse bombs and mines which is the place to kill you in the battlefield and then eliminate your enemies in Shooter Strike FPS. Shoot at site all of them with your modern guns in this shooting game 2017.

GAMEPLAY FEATURES:
• Play as Army Commando on a Survival Mission
• Eliminate Terrorist trying to Transport Weapons
• Thrill of Playing as an Army Stealth Spy
• Highly Additive & Immersive Gameplay
• Aim, Shoot and Take Kills
• Multiple Weapons like Sniper, AK and Assault Guns
